alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL BUTTE...WESTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Spearfish Canyon, or near Spearfish, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southeastern Spearfish around 505 PM MDT. Saint Onge around 510 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 12 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
